DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate symptom impact probiotic Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG rhinovirus infection .
DOC.brief_title: Rhinovirus Study With Lactobacillus Rhamnosus GG
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female general good health ( stabilize chronic illness regular medication accept , otherwise mention exclusion criterion ) 2 . Age 1865 year 3 . Serum neutralize antibody titer 1:4 less challenge rhinovirus 4 . No clinically significant find prestudy nasal examination 5 . Females must negative urine pregnancy test , woman childbearing potential must use effective method birth control , limited birth control pill , contraceptive foam , diaphragm , IUD , surgical sterilization , abstinence , condoms 6 . Written informed consent must obtain enrollment study 1 . Suffer history significant allergic rhinitis time study 2 . Bronchial asthma lower respiratory tract disease , chronic obstructive lung disease emphysema 3 . Nasal abnormalities nasal pathology , irreversible nasal mucosal hypertrophy severe nasal septum derivation 4 . Pregnancy lactation 5 . History alcohol abuse ( regularly consumes 5 alcohol drink per day ) and/or drug abuse 12 month period immediately precede study enrollment 6 . Daily smoking within past 2 year 7 . Use investigational product participation device trial 30 day period immediately precede study enrollment 8 . Previous participation experimental study rhinovirus 39 9 . Allergy ingredient study product 10 .
